name: node-scribe
author: Michael Dreibelbis <mike at belbis dot com>

scripts.coveralls: jscoverage src && SCRIBE_COV=1 mocha $(find test -name '*.js') --reporter=mocha-lcov-reporter | coveralls
scripts.cov-html: jscoverage src && SCRIBE_COV=1 mocha $(find test -name '*.js') --reporter=html-cov > coverage.html
